item.description:
Zumba is HOT!! Zumba is FUN!
Cooking on a new gas grill at the yacht club could be HOTTER!!! . . . if we had a new gas grill!
So come on down and join us for a fun night of Zumba!!

Be sure to bring a friend – or bring a dozen friends!!

(All proceeds will be donated to the yacht club for the purchase of a new gas grill)

Wednesday, June 30, 2010
6:30pm – 8:00pm
$10.00 per person

Edgewood Yacht Club
3 Shaw Ave, Cranston, RI

Nancy Aubin, Zumba Instructor

Zumba is a Latin inspired dance fitness class.

The steps are easy to follow, the music is a combination of Latin rhythms such as Salsa, Merengue and Cha-Cha. LOTS OF FUN!!!!
item.name: Zumba Fundraising Event @ Edgewood Yacht Club
